argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | decpmatval.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | decpmatval.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | #P_decpmatval0 | |- ( ( M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( M decompPMat K ) = ( i e. dom dom M , j e. dom dom M |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 5 | 1, 4, 2 | #P_matbas2i | |- ( M e. B -> M e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_elmapi | |- ( M e. ( ( Base ` R ) ^m ( N X. N ) ) -> M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fdm | |- ( M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) -> dom M = ( N X. N ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) -> dom dom M = dom ( N X. N ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_dmxpid | |- dom ( N X. N ) = N |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( M : ( N X. N ) --> ( Base ` R ) -> dom dom M = N ) |
| 11 | 5, 6, 10 | #P_3syl | |- ( M e. B -> dom dom M = N ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) -> dom dom M = N ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) = ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 12, 13 | #P_mpt2eq123dv | |- ( ( M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( i e. dom dom M , j e. dom dom M |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) = ( i e. N , j e. N |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) ) |
| 15 | 3, 14 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) -> ( M decompPMat K ) = ( i e. N , j e. N |-> ( ( coe1 ` ( i M j ) ) ` K ) ) ) |
